001package imagingbook.common.image.interpolation;
002
003/**
004 * <p>
005 * Enumeration type listing the most common interpolation methods.
006 * See Ch. 22 of [1] for additional details.
007 * </p>
008 * <p>
009 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>,
010 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
011 * </p>
012 */
013public enum InterpolationMethod {
014        NearestNeighbor,
015        Bilinear,
016        Bicubic,
017        BicubicSmooth,
018        BicubicSharp,
019        CatmullRom,
020        CubicBSpline,
021        MitchellNetravali,
022        Lanzcos2,
023        Lanzcos3,
024        Lanzcos4;
025}
